full_summary:
**Tender Announcement:**
**E60HL-240007_A - Carburant en barils pour le pont océanique de l'arctique**
**Reference Number:** WS4554419554-Doc4556015576
**Posting Date:** 2024-04-25
**Closing Date:** 2024-05-13, 14:00h EST

**Contract Overview:**
This tender announcement pertains to a requirement to supply diesel and other drummed fuels to the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG), Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) and the Department of the Environment (ECCC).

**Deliverables:**
A total of 205L and other drummed fuel products to be delivered to various shipping points across Atlantic Canada.

**Key Requirements:**

* Aviation Turbine Fuel (Jet A-1)
* Diesel
* Environmentally preferred plastic products

**Deliverables Specifications:**
Environmentally preferable packaging shall be used to minimize waste and ensure environmentally responsible disposal requirements.

**Notice:**
Please disregard the previously-posted closing time. All required documentation and bid submission shall be submitted by 2 p.m. EDT on 2024-05-13.

**Procurement Methodology:**
Competitive Open Bidding, fixed-price.

**Solicitation Number:** WS4554419554

**Evaluation Criteria:**
Technical Merit (40%) and Price (60%).

**Trade Agreements:**
The tender is open to Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Korea-Canada Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

**Compliance:**
Suppliers are expected to comply with all applicable laws, regulations and policies. Green Procurement has been incorporated into the procurement process, emphasizing the importance of environmentally preferable packaging.

**Contracting Entity:**
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)

**Contact Information:**
Hiltz, Jackson (SPAC/PSPC)

Email: [jhiltz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jhiltz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
